title: US will pay price for Olympics boycott, China says
content: China angrily denounces a US plan not to send diplomats to the 2022 Winter Olympics in Beijing.

title: US will pay price for Olympics boycott, China says
content: China angrily denounces a US plan not to send diplomats to the 2022 Winter Olympics in Beijing.

title: Whistleblower describes 'chaos' of UK Afghan exit
content: Thousands of pleas for help went unread and the foreign secretary lacked urgency, an ex-official says.

title: Facebook sued for $150bn over Rohingya hate speech
content: The social media giant is accused of fuelling violence against the persecuted minority in Myanmar.

title: Western powers back Ukraine amid invasion fears
content: The US and its European allies urge Russia to de-escalate, amid fears it could invade Ukraine.

title: US billionaire hands over antiquities worth $70m
content: Michael Steinhardt is banned for life from buying such treasures following an investigation.

title: Drake withdraws Grammy Award nominations
content: The decision has reportedly been made at the request of Drake and his management.

title: Australian conman caught after six-month manhunt
content: Peter Foster was declared a fugitive six months ago after allegedly skipping bail on fraud charges.
